Posts.Content: The only difference in my experience and yours was size of tumor. It was 6mm. I had a lumpectomy, radiation, and chemo. I am two and one half years out from initial diagnosis. It was not an easy journey, but was the best way for me. If to do over I would choose mastectomy over lumpectomy. Prayers for you.
